Articles.Content: Why radar on boat cant detect target plane at 20km+ even when plane near boat ( 5km- ) still not detect . Radar detect only when plane launch missile ( just detect missile   Not plane ) this error or something else?? ( like stealth ). I am use lasted version of BDarmory.

Hi have you installed Physics Range Extender?  If you have not that would easily explain your problem.  IF you have installed Physics Range Extender and still have a problem, You will need to supply   a zipped copy of your KSP .log in order  for anyone to even attempt to diagnose your issue .
